titleStmt.title: A representation of the government of the borough of Evesham in the county of Worcester, from many of the inhabitants thereof directed unto the Protector of England, Scotland, and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1634-1689.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Tho. Cartwright [and 15 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
